subject: Doping (Sports)
Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: A Minnesota judge temporarily blocked the N.F.L.’s suspension of the Vikings’ defensive linemen Kevin Williams and Pat Williams for violating the league’s antidoping policy.
snippet: A Minnesota judge temporarily blocked the N.F.L.’s suspension of the Vikings’ defensive linemen Kevin Williams and Pat Williams for violating the league’s antidoping policy.
